contest-event.event-date:
May 16, 1885 D Gainsborough Contest
Gainsborough Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
gainsborough-contest
None
Northolme Cricket Ground, Gainsborough Promoted by Gainsborough Britannia Works Band Prizes: £10 and 16 guinea euphoniume, £7 and 9 guinea tenor horn, £5, £2 10s A cornet, value £5 5s, for the best Lincolnshire band that had not won a prize since 1870, together with £2 offered as a first prize to any Lincolnshire band, went to the Grimsby Artillery Volunteers Wyke Old Band had been entered but having failed to send a representative to draw for a place, they were disqualified, although the full band was present in time for the contest. 10 bands competed.
Dec. 29, 2011, 10:27 a.m. Aug. 28, 2016, 10:40 a.m.

4 Batley Old Benjamin Denton Jackson Fantasie Operatic
5 Sutton in Ashfield A. Howard Bonser Rienzi [arr. Round]
